events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering as a software developer role, ready for the next step.
A recruiter experienced in technical roles has been assigned to handle this engineering applicant and coordinate next steps.
Initial phone screening with the candidate completed; they demonstrated strong software development knowledge and good communication.
Candidate responded positively to the invitation for a technical interview and confirmed availability for the scheduled date.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week to assess the candidateâ€™s engineering skills and problem-solving capabilities.
Technical interview completed successfully; candidate demonstrated excellent coding skills and system design understanding.
HR interview scheduled to discuss role expectations, company culture, and compensation details with the candidate.
HR interview completed; candidate expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity and company values.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and start date to finalize the hiring process.
Candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and mentioned eagerness to join the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the offer and confirmed their start date with the recruiting team.
Onboarding process has started with welcome sessions and access provision for the new software engineer.
The hiring process is officially closed. The new engineer is fully onboarded and integrated into the development team.
